Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map DE_LOTUS_SM


Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: November 1 2014

Here is the Navigation Mesh for excellent Italy-styled map [de_lotus_sm](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/165794) by mantra (released July 2012).
It's a manually reworked and carefully optimized .nav-file (because in original author's release the .nav-file probably was slightly corrected auto-gen embedded in .bsp).

This Navigation Mesh was hand-maded approximately for 80% 'cause auto-gen constructed many areas inexact (the special attention was paid to apertures of oar doors and stair transitions).

Bots use all possible ways now (except provided in the note below) and move according to all levels of this map quite surely.

IMPORTANT NOTE: Bots don't go through ventilating hole in a bathroom on the second floor of one of main building (however as well as the most people), because it too small and access to it is complicated. To force bots to take place precisely in this hole is technically impossible (imho).

Also this Navigation Mesh is fully Place Painted.

Except everything told has to note still that bots (on the unknown to me reason) hate the benches in church and a small fishes in the river... also shoot them without any mercy! Maybe it's simple stress manifestations? :D

Play & Enjoy! Always will be grateful for your remarks and feedbacks.

Credits and Gratitudes:
   mantra (for nice extended version of map de_lotus),

Read your intimate mantras to a blossomed lotus flower... or just kill all your enemy bastards! :-)
